scripts.build: npm run min-index && npm run min-all && npm run merge-all
scripts.min-all: npm run min-index; npm run min-js; npm run min-css;
scripts.merge-all: npm run merge-js; npm run merge-css
scripts.min-js: minify ./assets/js/drift.js > ./assets/js/drift.min.js && minify ./assets/js/application.js > ./assets/js/application.min.js && minify ./assets/js/jquery.js > ./assets/js/jquery.min.js && minify ./assets/js/head.js > ./assets/js/head.min.js && minify ./assets/js/imagesloaded.js > ./assets/js/imagesloaded.min.js && minify ./assets/js/masonry.js > ./assets/js/masonry.min.js && minify ./assets/js/class_helper.js > ./assets/js/class_helper.min.js && minify ./assets/js/carousel.js > ./assets/js/carousel.min.js && minify ./assets/js/jquery.easypiechart.js > ./assets/js/jquery.easypiechart.min.js && minify ./assets/js/text.rotator.js > ./assets/js/text.rotator.min.js && minify ./assets/js/global.fx.js > ./assets/js/global.fx.min.js && minify ./assets/js/settings.js > ./assets/js/settings.min.js
scripts.min-css: minify ./assets/css/normalize.css > ./assets/css/normalize.min.css && minify ./assets/css/portfolio.css > ./assets/css/portfolio.min.css && minify ./assets/css/carousel.css > ./assets/css/carousel.min.css && minify ./assets/css/scroll.css > ./assets/css/scroll.min.css && minify ./assets/css/style.css > ./assets/css/style.min.css && minify ./assets/css/responsive.css > ./assets/css/responsive.min.css
